oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt 01 from consolidation interview with Clay Bailey, March 1, 1995
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an interview with Clay Bailey, conducted on March 1, 1995 by Carole Bucy as part of the Metro Consolidation Oral History Interviews. Bailey discusses his role in the consolidation of the city and county governments. He also comments briefly on other individuals and their contributions. The complete record of the interview is available at the Metro Government Archives.
